## MondrianDataClient class

base class of data client

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MondrianDataClient 
```

## Remarks

implements [IMondrianDataClient](./mondrian.imondriandataclient.md)<!-- -->. Do default binding job. Beding default empty data client, it implements empty in/out APIs.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [receivedFromRemote](./mondrian.mondriandataclient.receivedfromremote.md) |  | [MondrianDataClientReceivedListener](./mondrian.mondriandataclientreceivedlistener.md) | called when client received data from removeListener |
|  [recoveredFromRemote](./mondrian.mondriandataclient.recoveredfromremote.md) |  | MondrianDataClientRecoveredListener | called when client recovered data from removeListener |
